autoRestart.description: Whether to automatically restart after it is stopped.
autoRestart.label: Auto-restart

config.description: The various additions and modifications that can be made to your start script.
config.label: Config

enviroments.description: The operating system that the server runs on.

command.description: Only the java command required to start the server
command.label: Command

environments.description: The operating system that the server runs on.
environments.label: Operating System

linux.description: The most common operating system used for servers
linux.label: Linux

pterodactyl.description: Web-based server management platform used by most hosts
pterodactyl.label: Pterodactyl

windows.description: The most common operating system used for home desktops
windows.label: Windows

benchmarkedGraalVM.description: Additional performance flags for Benchmarked (G1GC) exclusive to GraalVM users.
benchmarkedGraalVM.label: Benchmarked (GraalVM)

extraFlags.description: Additional flags that may improve performance or change functionality.
extraFlags.label: Extra Flags

vectors.description: Enables SIMD operations to optimize map item rendering on Pufferfish and its forks.
vectors.label: Modern Vectors

fileName.description: The name of the file that will be used to start your server.
fileName.label: File Name

aikars.description: The classic and reliable flags for boosting your server's performance.
aikars.label: Aikar's Flags

benchmarkedG1GC.description: Performance flags backed by benchmarks. Uses G1GC, similar to Aikar's flags.
benchmarkedG1GC.label: Benchmarked (G1GC)

benchmarkedShenandoah.description: Performance flags backed by benchmarks. Uses Shenandoah, similar to hilltty's flags.
benchmarkedShenandoah.label: Benchmarked (Shenandoah)

benchmarkedZGC.description: Performance flags backed by benchmarks. Uses ZGC, which is quite unreliable between different systems.
benchmarkedZGC.label: Benchmarked (ZGC)

flags.description: The collection of start arguments that typically optimize the server's performance.

etils.description: Experimental and archived performance flags based on Aikar's Flags, exclusive to Linux users.
etils.label: Etil's Flags

hillttys.description: Experimental performance flags based on Shenandoah GC. May require additional setup.
hillttys.label: hilltty's Flags

flags.label: Flags

none.description: A blank slate for your server.
none.label: None

obyduxs.description: Experimental performance flags based on Etil's Flags and Benchmarked (G1GC), exclusive to Linux users. May require additional setup.
obyduxs.label: Obydux's Flags

proxy.description: Generic performance flags for most proxy server software.
proxy.label: Proxy

gui.description: Whether to display the built-in server management GUI.
gui.label: No GUI

memory.description: The amount of memory (RAM) to allocate to your server.
memory.label: Memory

warning.high: It's recommended to decrease the amount of memory allocated to the server.
warning.low: It's recommended to increase the amount of memory allocated to the server.

script.description: The resulting script that can be used to start your server. Place this file in the same location as {{fileName}}, then execute it!
script.label: Script

software.description: The software in which your Minecraft server will run on.
software.label: Software

flags.subtitle: A simple script generator to start your Minecraft servers with optimal flags.
flags.title: Flags Generator

variables.description: Whether to use environment variables within the script to define memory, file name, and other commonly changed elements.
variables.label: Use Variables
